author: Simon Difford
description: Lemon and honey with a touch of bittersweet flavoursome gentian liqueur.
name: Original Sin (Gin Joint recipe)
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth
10 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
20 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SWIZZLE all ingredients in a Julep cup with crushed ice
